bio.title: Who I Am
bio.description: I'm Thibaut Faucheux, a 21-year-old engineering student passionate about building scalable web applications and solving complex technical challenges. Currently working as an Application Developer Apprentice at Pilot Corporation of Europe in Annecy, I combine academic learning with real-world professional experience.
bio.education: Pursuing Master of Engineering in Computer Science at CESI Lyon (2022-2027)
bio.passion: Passionate about full-stack development, modern web technologies, and continuous improvement
bio.goal: Seeking internship and career opportunities to grow as a software engineer and create meaningful impact
